Text: Judicial Preference PollMembers Have you returned your HBA Judicial Preference Poll The deadline to return the Preference Poll is pm on Friday September If you have not yet returned your Poll please do so today

Harvest PartyYour Reservations for the Fall Harvest Party Benefiting the Houston Bar Foundation November PM River Oaks Country Club The Houston Bar Associations grand fall social event the Harvest Party is also the Associations major fundraising event for the Houston Bar Foundation Dont miss the opportunity to join your friends and colleagues in the legal profession for an elegant evening at River Oaks Country Club on Monday November from pm until pm The entire country club has been reserved for HBA members and their guests As always the Harvest Party will feature fine refreshments surroundings and the company of your colleagues in the legal profession More than persons attended last years gala event This years Harvest Party Chair is Tom Godbold of Fulbright Jaworski LLP The Houston Bar Foundation supports such crucial projects as the Houston Volunteer Lawyers Program providing pro bono legal services to indigent Houstonians in civil matters Tickets for the st Harvest Party are per person Send your check payable to the Houston Bar Foundation along with the names of all attending in your party to Harvest Party Houston Bar Foundation Fannin Suite Houston TX no later than pm on Thursday Nov For information call Rusty Bienvenue or Kelly Isenberger at The Harvest Party is graciously underwritten by the following firms and corporations Gold Underwriters Andrews Kurth LLP Baker Botts LLP Fulbright Jaworski LLP Vinson Elkins LLP Platinum Underwriters Bracewell Patterson LLP Silver Underwriters Locke Liddell Sapp LLP Diamond Underwriters American General BP Amoco Helm Pletcher Bowen Saunders LLP Howrey Simon Arnold White Mayor Day Caldwell Keeton LLP Ocean Energy Southwest Bank Williams Gas Weil Gotshal Manges LLP Bronze Underwriters Arthur Andersen LLP Beirne Maynard Parsons LLP Brobeck Phleger Harrison LLP Compaq Computer Corp Duke Energy Enron Ernst Young Gardere Wynne Sewell Riggs Gibbs Bruns LLP Hanen Alexander Johnson Spalding LLP Hardy Johns PC King Spalding Lanier Parker Sullivan PC LeBoeuf Lamb Green MacRae LLP Reliant Energy Ridgways Legal Solutions Sheinfeld Maley Kay PC Shell Oil Co Foundation Susman Godfrey LLP Crystal Underwriters Abraham Mendelson PC Mattheisen Chase Erwin LLP McGlinchey Stafford PLLC Porter Hedges LLP Schwartz Junell Campbell Oathout LLP Sheehy Serpe Ware PC Solar Associates Tindall Foster PC Tucker Hendryx Taunton Snyder Slade PC Winstead Sechrest Minick PC Zimmerman Axelrad Meyer Stern Wise PC Friend Cruse Scott Henderson Allen LLP J Richard Cheney
